name: Page
body:
## [如何在Spring Data Jpa下快速实现读写分离](http://www.zedcn.com/spring_data_jpa_database_multi_datasource.html)
2016/11/8 by Zed

本文通过实现Spring JDBC下AbstractRoutingDataSource，通过AOP切入Repository的各个继承接口的方法调用，根据JPA方法命名规范定义执行类型（查询/非查询），动态切换数据源。
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
